title: Willem Dafoe | Republicans Can’t Defend Trump’s Corrupt Abuses of Power: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Trump’s allies flailing as they try to defend him in both the impeachment inquiry and the controversy over his decision to abandon the Kurds.

Then, Seth talks to actor Willem Dafoe, who also takes a few more questions backstage from Late Night's Henry Melcher.
